Muertos Multiplier Megaways
Muertos Multiplier Megaways è la slot sviluppata dal noto studio Pragmatic Play. Rilasciato nell’ottobre 2022, questo gioco è diventato un successo immediato tra i fan delle slot a tema Messico per la sua entusiasmante trama e la fantastica grafica.
Questa recensione descrive in dettaglio tutte le sue caratteristiche chiave che, insieme alla modalità di test gratuita disponibile sul nostro sito, ti aiuteranno a celebrare il Giorno dei Morti come si deve!
Muertos Multiplier Megaways: gameplay, RTP e pagamenti
Non è raro in questo periodo dell’anno vedere un discreto numero di slot ispirate alle festività, in particolare quelle basate su Halloween e Natale, ma è anche un’opportunità per i fornitori come Pragmatic Play di farci scoprire tradizioni altrettanto importanti provenienti da altre culture, in questo caso del Messico.
Muertos Multiplier Megaways è una slot a 6 rulli con fino a 117.649 modi per vincere. Le combinazioni vincenti si formano quando 3 o più (o 2 o più dei simboli che pagano di più) compaiono da sinistra a destra, partendo dal rullo più a sinistra.
La puntata minima disponibile per i giocatori è 0,20€ per giro e la puntata massima disponibile è 100€ per giro, con molte altre opzioni di scommessa tra le due. Muertos Multiplier Megaways ha un RTP teorico del 96,03% e una capacità di vincita massima di 10.000x.
Quali sono i simboli e funzioni del gioco base?
Come la maggior parte dei titoli Megaways, Muertos Multiplier presenta sia i rulli a cascata (Cascading Reels) che la meccanica a scorrimento (Sliding Reel).
Cascading Reels – Ogni volta che si forma una combinazione vittoriosa, i simboli vincenti verranno rimossi dai rulli e nuovi simboli scenderanno dall’alto. Una volta che si verifica una cascata, le possibilità di realizzare combinazioni fortunate aumentano;
Sliding Reels – Se viene formata una combinazione vincente utilizzando uno o più simboli sulla bobina scorrevole, anche questi verranno rimossi e tutti i simboli rimanenti scivoleranno di una posizione a sinistra mentre nuove icone riempiranno sul rullo tutte le posizioni vuote.
In termini di simboli, l’icona regolare più remunerativa in Muertos Multiplier Megaways è il teschio, seguito dalla salsa piccante, dal cactus, dal taco, dai nachos e dalla chitarra. I simboli di basso valore sono i Picche, i Quadri, i Fiori e i Cuori.
C’è anche un simbolo Wild presente solo sullo Sliding Reel, che sostituisce tutti i simboli tranne gli Scatter. Durante il gioco base, ogni volta che un simbolo Wild appare, rivelerà un moltiplicatore casuale di x2 o x3.
Funzionalità speciali: Giri Gratis,

Giri Gratuiti
L’atterraggio di 3, 4, 5 o 6 Scatter sui rulli attiva il round dei giri gratuiti. Prima dell’inizio del round bonus, verrà selezionato un numero casuale di FS tramite una ruota;
Bonus Buy
Pragmatic Play ha concesso ai giocatori l’accesso ai giri gratuiti per un costo totale di 100x la tua scommessa. L’RTP quando si acquistano giri gratuiti scende leggermente dal 96,03% al 96,00%.

Muertos Multiplier Megaways: le mie considerazioni
Con così tante slot ispirate al Giorno dei Morti, all’inizio non mi sono entusiasmata più di tanto. Ma una volta attivata la funzione Wild Multiplier, la mia percezione del gioco è cambiata radicalmente e ho iniziato a divertirmi.
Tutto sommato, Muertos Multiplier Megaways è un titolo interessante, anche se non aggiunge niente di nuovo. Se ti piace il genere, ti suggerisco di provare in Demo anche la Taberna De Los Muertos di Habanero.

Qual è la caratteristica del moltiplicatore jolly dello slot Muertos Multiplier Megaways?

I simboli jolly nella slot Muertos Multiplier Megaways hanno moltiplicatori di 2x o 3x. Una funzione a cascata rimuove i simboli vincenti per formare potenzialmente nuove vincite e i moltiplicatori jolly si accumulano durante qualsiasi sequenza.



Qual è la puntata minima sulla slot Muertos Multiplier Megaways?

Puoi giocare allo slot Muertos Multiplier Megaways partendo da 0,20€ a giro. Se vuoi aumentare la posta in gioco, ci sono molte opzioni fino ad un massimo di 100€. È una gamma più ampia rispetto a molte altre slot machine Megaways.

Muertos Multiplier Megaways: An Exciting Slot Game Developed by Pragmatic Play

Muertos Multiplier Megaways is a slot game developed by the renowned studio, Pragmatic Play. Released in October 2022, this game has instantly become a hit among Mexico-themed slot fans due to its thrilling plot and fantastic graphics. 

As an experienced gambler, you will appreciate the unique features of this game. With up to 117,649 ways to win, Muertos Multiplier Megaways is a 6-reel slot game where winning combinations are formed when 3 or more symbols appear from left to right, starting from the leftmost reel. The minimum bet available for players is €0.20 per spin, while the maximum bet is €100 per spin, with many other betting options in between. This game has a theoretical RTP of 96.03% and a maximum win capacity of 10,000x. 

The game features Cascading Reels and Sliding Reels, where winning symbols are removed from the reels, and new symbols fall from the top. The more cascades you achieve, the higher your chances of hitting a lucky streak. Muertos Multiplier Megaways also has a Wild symbol that appears only on the Sliding Reel, replacing all symbols except for the Scatter. Every time a Wild symbol appears, it reveals a random multiplier of x2 or x3. 

The round of Free Spins is triggered by landing three or more Scatters on the reels. Before the start of the bonus round, a random number of free spins is selected using a wheel. Additionally, players have the option of accessing Free Spins for a total cost of 100x their bet through the Bonus Buy function. 

Overall, Muertos Multiplier Megaways is an exciting slot game that doesn't add anything new to the genre but is still worth trying out. As an experienced gambler, you might appreciate the variety in the range of bets and the unique features offered by the game.

raw_translation.response:
Muertos Multiplier Megaways: A Game Review

Muertos Multiplier Megaways is a slot game developed by the renowned Pragmatic Play studio. Released in October 2022, this game has quickly become a hit among fans of Mexican-themed slots for its exciting storyline and fantastic graphics.

This review details all its key features, which, along with the free test mode available on our site, will help you celebrate the Day of the Dead in style!

Gameplay, RTP, and payouts

It is not uncommon at this time of year to see a number of slots inspired by holidays, particularly those based on Halloween and Christmas. But it is also an opportunity for providers like Pragmatic Play to introduce us to equally important traditions from other cultures, in this case from Mexico.

Muertos Multiplier Megaways is a 6-reel slot game with up to 117,649 ways to win. Winning combinations are formed when 3 or more (or 2 or more of the highest-paying symbols) appear from left to right, starting from the leftmost reel.

The minimum bet available to players is €0.20 per spin and the maximum bet available is €100 per spin, with many other betting options in between. Muertos Multiplier Megaways has a theoretical RTP of 96.03% and a maximum win capacity of 10,000x.

What are the symbols and features of the base game?

Like most Megaways titles, Muertos Multiplier features both Cascading Reels and Sliding Reel mechanics.

Cascading Reels – Every time a winning combination is formed, the winning symbols will be removed from the reels and new symbols will fall from above. Once a cascade occurs, the chances of getting lucky combinations increase.

Sliding Reels – If a winning combination is made using one or more symbols on the sliding reel, these will also be removed and all remaining symbols will slide one position to the left while new icons will fill the empty reel positions.

In terms of symbols, the most lucrative regular icon in Muertos Multiplier Megaways is the skull, followed by hot sauce, cactus, taco, nachos, and guitar. The low-value symbols are Spades, Diamonds, Clubs, and Hearts.

There is also a Wild symbol present only on the Sliding Reel, which substitutes for all symbols except the Scatter. During the base game, every time a Wild symbol appears, it will reveal a random multiplier of x2 or x3.

Special features: Free Spins.

Free Spins

Landing 3, 4, 5, or 6 Scatters on the reels activates the free spins round. Before the bonus round starts, a random number of FS will be selected by a wheel;

Bonus Buy

Pragmatic Play has granted players access to free spins for a total cost of 100x your bet. The RTP when buying free spins drops slightly from 96.03% to 96.00%.

Muertos Multiplier Megaways: My Considerations

With so many slots inspired by the Day of the Dead, initially, I wasn't so excited. But once the Wild Multiplier feature was activated, my perception of the game changed radically and I started having fun.

All in all, Muertos Multiplier Megaways is an interesting title, although it doesn't add anything new. If you like the genre, I suggest trying Habanero's Taberna De Los Muertos in Demo mode as well.

FAQs

Can I play Muertos Multiplier Megaways for free?

Certainly, Slotjava.it is the perfect platform to test Muertos Multiplier Megaways without registration or game download.

What is the Wild multiplier feature in the Muertos Multiplier Megaways slot?

The Wild symbols in the Muertos Multiplier Megaways slot have multipliers of 2x or 3x. A cascade feature removes winning symbols to potentially form new wins, and wild multipliers accumulate during any sequence.

What is the minimum bet in the Muertos Multiplier Megaways slot?

You can play the Muertos Multiplier Megaways slot starting from €0.20 per spin. If you want to increase your stake, there are many options up to a maximum of €100. It is a wider range than many other Megaways slot machines.

Muertos Multiplier Megaways is a 6-reel slot game with up to 117,649 ways to win. Winning combinations are formed when 3 or more (or 2 or more of the highest-paying symbols) appear from left to right, starting from the leftmost reel.

The minimum bet available to players is €0.20 per spin and the maximum bet available is €100 per spin, with many other betting options in between. Muertos Multiplier Megaways has a theoretical RTP of 96.03% and a maximum win capacity of 10,000x.

What are the symbols and features of the base game?

Like most Megaways titles, Muertos Multiplier features both Cascading Reels and Sliding Reel mechanics.

Cascading Reels – Every time a winning combination is formed, the winning symbols will be removed from the reels and new symbols will fall from above. Once a cascade occurs, the chances of getting lucky combinations increase.

Sliding Reels – If a winning combination is made using one or more symbols on the sliding reel, these will also be removed and all remaining symbols will slide one position to the left while new icons will fill the empty reel positions.

In terms of symbols, the most lucrative regular icon in Muertos Multiplier Megaways is the skull, followed by hot sauce, cactus, taco, nachos, and guitar. The low-value symbols are Spades, Diamonds, Clubs, and Hearts.

There is also a Wild symbol present only on the Sliding Reel, which substitutes for all symbols except the Scatter. During the base game, every time a Wild symbol appears, it will reveal a random multiplier of x2 or x3.

With so many slots inspired by the Day of the Dead, initially, I wasn't so excited. But once the Wild Multiplier feature was activated, my perception of the game changed radically and I started having fun.
